subject: Re: [PATCH v4 29/31] mm: memcontrol: prepare for reparenting non-hierarchical stats

reviews.author: Qi Zheng (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Qi Zheng pointed out that the patch for non-hierarchical stats does not reparent LRU folios, and suggested to place the usage of two functions in a separate patch.

reviews.author: Shakeel Butt
reviews.summary: Shakeel Butt reviewed patch [PATCH v4 29/31] mm: memcontrol: prepare for reparenting non-hierarchical stats, providing minor comments and suggestions.

reviews.author: Usama Arif
reviews.summary: Usama Arif raised a concern that the patch might break lockdep on more than 4 NUMA nodes due to acquiring two locks per node.

reviews.author: Harry Yoo
reviews.summary: The reviewer, Harry Yoo, pointed out a type mismatch in the nr_pages parameter of mem_cgroup_update_lru_size() and requested it be changed to long.
